title: Energy Hubs: How We Design Them as Smart Energy Communities
subtitle: Building smart energy systems that empower local communities to take control of their energy futures.
featuredImageAlt: Colorful isometric illustration of a smart energy hub with solar panels, wind turbines, battery storage, and a city skyline
excerpt: Smart energy systems are more than technology. They are carried by local communities realising they can take power back over their own energy grids. Here's how we design Energy Hubs as smart energy communities.
